name: That Time in '88
storyline: This piece is an interactive remix of That Time in '88 by Shortcircles. It's kind of like a theme park ride through a city that's waking up at dawn. Look around with the mouse to continue on your path or select one of a few branches, and hear a different mix of the music depending on where you go. There's no rush to continue; the music will keep going no matter how long you take. And there's no wrong path, only different ones.
summary: That Time in '88 is a 3D music journey.
